name: ​DirectMessage​MemberActivityPage

fields.name: activities
fields.description: Collection of direct message member activities.

fields.name: currentPageUrl
fields.description: Chatter REST API URL identifying the current page.

fields.name: nextPageToken
fields.description: Token identifying the next page, or null if there isn’t a next page.

fields.name: nextPageUrl
fields.description: Chatter REST API URL identifying the next page, or null if there isn’t a next page.

description: A page of direct message member activities.
